name: 2 Tales
description:
**Work in progress.**

Move the pieces of the tale until it forms a coherent story.

There are 2 sides for each piece. Each side tells a different story. Side A  reads left to right. Side B reads top to bottom. A link between pieces is formed if a column or row is built correctly.

Up, down, left, right: select and read a different piece.

Z: Change from side A to B or from B to A.

X: Swap to pieces.

Made for the "I can't write but want to tell a story" jam.
